summary: Two New York City longshoremen Axel Nordmann, an Army deserter and Tommy Tyler, an easy-going freight car loader whose growing friendship is threatened by Charles Malik, a notably repellent punk.
cast: John Cassavetes|Sidney Poitier|Jack Warden|Kathleen Maguire|Ruby Dee|Val Avery|Robert F. Simon|Ruth White|William A. Lee|John Kellogg|David Clarke|Estelle Hemsley|Ralph Bell|Mike Dana|Roy Glenn|Charles Jordan|Mike O'Dowd
keywords: new york city|longshoreman|revenge|murder|based on tv movie
title: Donde la ciudad termina
